naslov: Kamena kuća starina Tkon 120.00 m2 otok Pašman (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se stara kamena kuća u najstarijem dijelu stare jezgre Kuna sa predivnim pogledom na pašmanski kanal i otočiće ! Dio nekadasnje velike kovačnice je jedna od najstarijih kuća u Kunu, ima đardin i veliki parking,sva infrastruktura je odmah do kuće te se nalazi 100m od centra mista i svih potrebnih sadržaja a oko 150m do prve plaže. Potrebna je kompletna obnova kuće nakon koje će stari kamen opet dobiti svoj nekadasnji sjaj i svoju jedinstvenu i posebnu priču. Mogu i osigurati majstora za kamen! ENGLISH An old stone house for sale in the oldest part of the old town of Kun with a wonderful view of the Pašman channel and small islands! Part of the former large forge is one of the oldest houses in Tkon, it has a garden and a large parking lot, all the infrastructure is right next to the house and it is located 100m from the center of the town and all the necessary facilities and about 150m to the first beach. A complete renovation of the house is needed, after which the old stone will regain its former glory and its unique and special story. I can also provide a stone craftsman! Biograd na moru 2km Kornati 5km Dugi otok 10km Otok Ugljan 20km Zadar 25km
